description: This table contains data elements submitted for CMS ESRD death forms (CMS-2746).

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the registry data record.

columns.name: FORM_IDENTIFIER
columns.description: This item is used in CMS death form 2746 reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's form 2746 ID.

columns.name: ADMISSION_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores the dialysis patient's admission facility ID.

columns.name: PAT_FIRST_NAME
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's first name.

columns.name: PAT_MIDDLE_INITIAL
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's middle name initial.

columns.name: PAT_LAST_NAME
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's last name.

columns.name: DLYS_NAME_SUFFIX_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's name suffix.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Jr


Sr


II


III


IV


V


VI

columns.name: DLYS_PAT_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's sex assigned at birth.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


F


M

columns.name: PAT_BIRTH_DATE
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's date of birth.

columns.name: PAT_SSN
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's Social Security Number.

columns.name: PAT_HICNUM
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's Medicare health insurance claim number.

columns.name: PAT_MBI_NUM
columns.description: It stores a dialysis patient's Medicare Beneficiary Identifier number for dialysis regulatory reporting.

columns.name: PHYSICAL_ADDRESS_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores the state from a dialysis patient's physical address.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: DIA_CMS_DEATH_MODALITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used in CMS death form 2746 reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's treatment modality at the time of death.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


IncenterHemodialysis


HomeHemodialysis


CAPD


CCPD


Transplant


Other

columns.name: DIA_CMS_DEATH_PLACE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used in CMS death form 2746 reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's location at the time of death.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Hospital


DialysisUnit


Home


Other


NursingHome

columns.name: PRIMARY_DIA_CMS_DEATH_CAUSE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used in CMS death form 2746 reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's primary cause of death.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Myocardial infarction, acute


Hyperkalemia


Pericarditis, incl. Cardiac tamponade


Atherosclerotic heart disease


Cardiomyopathy


Cardiac arrhythmia


Cardiac arrest, cause unknown


Valvular heart disease


Pulmonary edema due to exogenous fluid


Congestive Heart Failure


Septicemia due to internal vascular access


Septicemia due to vascular access catheter


Pulmonary embolus


Cerebrovascular accident including intracranial hemorrhage


Ischemic brain damage/Anoxic encephalopathy


Hemorrhage from transplant site


Hemorrhage from vascular access


Hemorrhage from dialysis circuit


Hemorrhage from ruptured vascular aneurysm


Hemorrhage from surgery (not 38, 39, or 41)


Other hemorrhage (not 38-42, 72)


Mesenteric infarction/ischemic bowel


Peritoneal access infectious complication, bacterial


Peritoneal access infectious complication, fungal


Peritonitis (complication of peritoneal dialysis)


Central nervous system infection (brain abscess, meningitis, encephalitis, etc.)


Septicemia due to peripheral vascular disease, gangrene


Septicemia, other


Cardiac infection (endocarditis)


Pulmonary infection (pneumonia, influenza)


Abdominal infection (peritonitis (not comp of PD), perforated bowel, diverticular disease, gallbladder)


Hepatitis B


Other viral hepatitis


Liver-drug toxicity


Cirrhosis


Polycystic liver disease


Liver failure, cause unknown or other


Genito-urinary infection


Hepatitis C


Gastro-intestinal hemorrhage


Pancreatitis


Perforation of peptic ulcer


Perforation of bowel (not 75)


Hypokalemia


Hypernatremia


Hyponatremia


Bone marrow depression


Cachexia/failure to thrive


Malignant disease, patient ever on Immunosuppressive therapy


Malignant disease (not 82)


Dementia, incl. dialysis dementia, Alzheimerï¿½s


Seizures


Chronic obstructive lung disease (COPD)


Complications of surgery


Air embolism


Accident related to treatment


Accident unrelated to treatment


Suicide


Drug overdose (street drugs)


Drug overdose (not 92 or 93)


Acidosis


Adrenal insufficiency


Hypothyroidism


Other cause of death


Unknown


Hypoglycemia


Hyperglycemia


Diabetic coma


Hyperthyroidism


Withdrawal from dialysis/uremia


COVID19


COVID19 Unconfirmed

columns.name: SEC_1_DIA_CMS_DEATH_CAUSE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used in CMS death form 2746 reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's secondary cause of death.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DIA_CMS_DEATH_CAUSE_C_NAME

columns.name: SEC_2_DIA_CMS_DEATH_CAUSE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used in CMS death form 2746 reporting. It indicates the second secondary cause of death of an expired dialysis patient.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DIA_CMS_DEATH_CAUSE_C_NAME

columns.name: SEC_3_DIA_CMS_DEATH_CAUSE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used in CMS death form 2746 reporting. It indicates the third secondary cause of death of an expired dialysis patient.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DIA_CMS_DEATH_CAUSE_C_NAME

columns.name: SEC_4_DIA_CMS_DEATH_CAUSE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used in CMS death form 2746 reporting. It indicates the fourth secondary cause of death of an expired dialysis patient.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: PRIMARY_DIA_CMS_DEATH_CAUSE_C_NAME

columns.name: OTHER_DEATH_CAUSE
columns.description: This item is used in CMS death form 2746 reporting. It stores a dialysis patient's cause of death if primary or secondary cause of death indicates other cause of death.

columns.name: WAS_DIA_TREAT_DISCON_YN
columns.description:
This item is used in CMS death form 2746 reporting. It indicates whether or not renal therapy was discontinued prior to a patient's death.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DLYS_TRT_DISCH_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used in CMS death form 2746 reporting. It stores the reason for discontinuing renal therapy prior to a patient's death.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


AccessFailure


TransplantFailure


ChronicFailure


MedicalComplication


Other

columns.name: LAST_TREATMENT_DATE
columns.description: This item is used in CMS death form 2746 reporting. It stores the date of last dialysis treatment if renal therapy was discontinued prior to a patient's death.

columns.name: DIA_CMS_DISC_REQUEST_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used in CMS death form 2746 reporting. It stores whether or not the discontinuation of renal therapy occurred after patient or family request.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


Unknown


NA

columns.name: TRANSPLANT_DATE_UKNWN_YN
columns.description:
This item is used in CMS death form 2746 reporting. It indicates whether the date of an expired patient's most recent kidney transplant is unknown.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: WAS_DIA_TREAT_DISCON_YN

columns.name: LAST_KIDNEY_TRANSPLANT_DATE
columns.description: This item is used in CMS death form 2746 reporting. It stores an expired dialysis patient's most recent kidney transplant date.

columns.name: DIA_CMS_DEATH_TXP_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used in CMS death form 2746 reporting. It stores the most recent kidney transplant type that a dialysis patient received before death.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


LivingRelated


LivingUnrelated


Deceased


Unknown

columns.name: GRAFT_FUNC_DEATH_DIA_CMS_YNU_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used in CMS death form 2746 reporting. It indicates whether or not a functioning graft was present at the time of a patient's death.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


Unknown

columns.name: WAS_TRT_RESUMED_DIA_CMS_YNU_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used in CMS death form 2746 reporting. It indicates whether an expired patient, prior to death, resumed renal therapy after receiving a transplant.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: GRAFT_FUNC_DEATH_DIA_CMS_YNU_C_NAME

columns.name: RECV_HOSPIC_CARE_DIA_CMS_YNU_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used in CMS death form 2746 reporting. It indicates whether or not a dialysis patient was receiving hospice care prior to death.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: GRAFT_FUNC_DEATH_DIA_CMS_YNU_C_NAME

columns.name: TREATMENT_PROV_ID
columns.description: This item is used in dialysis regulatory reporting. It stores the dialysis patient's treatment provider ID.
